A1_utile.name: A1_utile
A1_utile.prompt_template:
You are Agent A1. Analyze if this tweet is useful for Customer Support (SAV). useful = true if it is a complaint, question, or feedback. useful = false if it is spam, ads, or unrelated. Return JSON: {"utile": boolean}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A2_categorie.name: A2_categorie
A2_categorie.prompt_template:
You are Agent A2. Categorize this tweet into ONE of: "probleme", "question", "retour_client". Return JSON: {"categorie": "string"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A3_sentiment.name: A3_sentiment
A3_sentiment.prompt_template:
You are Agent A3. Determine the sentiment: "colere", "frustration", "neutre", "satisfaction". Return JSON: {"sentiment": "string"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A4_type_probleme.name: A4_type_probleme
A4_type_probleme.prompt_template:
You are Agent A4. Identify the problem type: "panne", "facturation", "abonnement", "resiliation", "information", "autre". Return JSON: {"type_probleme": "string"}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A5_gravite.name: A5_gravite
A5_gravite.prompt_template:
You are Agent A5. Score the gravity from -10 (extremely positive) to +10 (critical emergency). Return JSON: {"score_gravite": int}. Tweet:
{{full_text}}

A6_checker.name: A6_checker
A6_checker.prompt_template:
You are the Orchestrator. Validate the consistency of these results. If 'utile' is false, gravity should be near 0. Return JSON with final consolidated keys: {"utile": bool, "categorie": str, "sentiment": str, "type_probleme": str, "score_gravite": int, "status": "success/error"}. Inputs:
{{agent_results}}
